scripts.preinstall: cd client && npm install &&  cd ../server/functions && npm install
scripts.serve: npm run clean && cd client && npm run build-move && cd ../server && firebase serve
scripts.deploy-hosting: npm run clean && cd client && npm run build-move && cd ../server && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && cd client && npm run build-move && cd ../server && firebase deploy
